unBlockBotDialogWelcomeMsg: Hi Mary, I’m your virtual concierge!
unblockBotDialogMasterErrorMsg: Well this is awkward. Looks like we're having some issues today...
mainDialogFeedbackMsg: Before you go, could I ask you to rate the service you received today?
confirmLookIntoStepStandardMsg: I looked at your application and I can see there’s a block on your file. Do you want me to look into that?
confirmLookIntoStepRetryMsg: Sorry, do you want me to take a look at your file?
confirmLookIntoStepErrorMsg: Sorry Mary, I’m not able to help you.
confirmLookIntoStepCloseMsg: Ok, no problem. Let me know if you change your mind!
